subject: Television
Decisions and Verdicts
Organized Labor
Football
lead_paragraph: In 18 years, David S. Doty, the federal judge whose ruling on the N.F.L.’s television contracts favored the union, has ruled mostly against the league.
snippet: In 18 years, David S. Doty, the federal judge whose ruling on the N.F.L.’s television contracts favored the union, has ruled mostly against the league.
